entity.name: triple
entity.query: SELECT s.id as internal_id, s.serialisedId as id, s.ontology_id, s.effectiveTime, s.groupId, s.active, s.characteristicType_id as ct_id, s.module_id, s.modifier_id, s.subject_id, s.predicate_id, s.object_id, o.id as ontology_id, o.name as ontology_title, characteristicType_concept.serialisedId as characteristicType_concept_id, module_concept.serialisedId as module_concept_id, modifier_concept.serialisedId as modifier_concept_id, subject_concept.serialisedId as object_concept_id, predicate_concept.serialisedId as attribute_concept_id, object_concept.serialisedId as value_concept_id, subject_concept.fullySpecifiedName as object_title, predicate_concept.fullySpecifiedName as attribute_title, object_concept.fullySpecifiedName as value_title FROM Statement s, Ontology o, Concept characteristicType_concept, Concept module_concept, Concept modifier_concept, Concept subject_concept, Concept predicate_concept, Concept object_concept WHERE o.id=s.ontology_id AND characteristicType_concept.id=s.characteristicType_id AND module_concept.id=s.module_id AND modifier_concept.id=s.modifier_id AND subject_concept.id=s.subject_id AND predicate_concept.id=s.predicate_id AND object_concept.id=s.object_id
